actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Committee on Foreign Affairs discharged in House.
Measure laid on table in House.

official_title: A resolution directing the Secretary of State to provide to the House of Representatives certain information with respect to the use in hostilities by Israel of aircraft of United States origin.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of State to provide the House of Representatives with information concerning: (1) Israeli use of military aircraft of U.S. origin outside Israeli borders; and (2) Israeli compliance with the Arms Export Control Act.

titles.title: A resolution directing the Secretary of State to provide to the House of Representatives certain information with respect to the use in hostilities by Israel of aircraft of United States origin.
